    I'm Theresa. I'm a third year student at the University of Toronto, completing a specialist in computer science (w/a focus in artificial intelligence + web & internet technologies), major in cognitive science (I want to read your mind), & minor in philosophy (what does any of this even mean?). Right now I'm really interested web design & development, but I make other things too (like really good mashed potatoes). Drop me a note & maybe we could make something together.

    tl;dr: nice to meet you.
